title: Interpretation of Laylat al-Qadr in a dream

preview.html: A dream about Laylat al-Qadr in a dream about a single girl, about a married woman, about a pregnant woman, about a divorced woman, about a man. Did I dream of praying Laylat al-Qadr except in Ramadan? Seeing the sun of Laylat al-Qadr by Ibn Sirin and other than Laylat al-Qadr in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we see. Many times, which has many different forms and meanings, the dream brings us goodness and subsequent happiness for the dreamer, as Laylat al-Qadr has an important significance. A place in the presence of God Almighty, which is the Night of Decree. It is one of the best and most important nights to come in time, as the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, called for investigating Laylat al-Qadr in the blessed month of Ramadan and waiting for it in the last ten days of the blessed month of Ramadan. The holy month, look for it in the past ten years. Interpretation of the Night of Destiny in a dream. Whoever dreams that he has seen the Night of Destiny or has seen it will be fine and safe for a long time. In our article today we review for you the interpretation of seeing the Night of Destiny in a dream by the famous translator Ibn Sirin, who explained it to us in full. Interpretation Night of Destiny in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing Night of Destiny in a dream is evidence of many good things that come to the dreamer. Night of Destiny in a dream also shows safety and security in the dreamer’s life and his needs will be met in the near future and his prayers will be answered. Seeing light on Night of Destiny in a dream is evidence To be guided on the right path. Hearing the Holy Qur’an in a dream on the Night of Destiny is evidence of a good ending. Seeing our Master Muhammad in a dream on the Night of Destiny is evidence of paying the debt to the debtor and the plight of the afflicted will disappear in the near future. It also suggests that you see the Prophet in a dream coming on the Night of Destiny, Evidence of the abundance of goodness that will come to the dreamer. Seeing a prisoner on the Night of Destiny in a dream means that he will soon be released from prison. Seeing a poor person on the Night of Destiny in a dream is evidence of the lawful money that he will receive soon. Seeing the sick person on the Night of Destiny is a sign of recovery. Urgent. Also, seeing a pregnant woman on Laylat al-Qadr in a dream indicates the birth of a boy. Praying on Laylat al-Qadr in a dream is evidence of a good ending that satisfies his need. Reciting the Qur’an on Laylat al-Qadr in a dream is a sign of the abundant goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of Laylat al-Qadr in a dream. Destiny in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the Night of Destiny in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of marriage in the near future. Also, seeing the Night of Destiny in the dream of an unmarried woman means that she will marry her lover and it will be a successful marriage. Seeing the Night of Destiny in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that she will enjoy success and prosperity in the future. The near future. The Night of Destiny in one’s dream is a sign of goodness and positive change. Interpretation of the Night of Destiny in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing a pregnant woman on the Night of Destiny in a dream indicates the birth of a child soon. Seeing a pregnant woman on the Night of Destiny in a dream is a sign of goodness and happiness. Also, Laylat al-Qadr in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates kindness and abundance of food. Also, Laylat al-Qadr in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates safety and a good birth. Interpretation of Laylat al-Qadr

title: Interpretation of my husband’s dream of removing a tooth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband getting a tooth in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about my husband getting a tooth in a dream, and it is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer wants to learn an interpretation about, but he must be careful that these interpretations are the interpretations of interpretation scholars and not those of managers. The site has a relationship with it, so be careful and do not believe these interpretations completely. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of removing a tooth in a dream Seeing the husband removing a tooth in a dream may indicate the fears and problems that the husband is suffering from during this time. Seeing the extraction of the upper molar in a dream may indicate some disturbances The health condition that a relative suffers from, and God knows best. Seeing a husband pulling a tooth may indicate problems that the woman may suffer from during that period, and she must seek God’s help. If he sees his tooth coming out in a dream without pain, this may indicate goodness and happiness for the husband, thanks to God. Interpretation Dreaming of my husband teaching me to drive a car in a dream: In the event that a woman sees that her husband is teaching her to drive in a dream, this may indicate that she is a very controlling person and that God knows best. A dream about a husband teaching a woman to drive may indicate that he trusts her to make some important decisions within the home. Anyone who dreams That her husband was teaching her how to drive a car in a dream may indicate her authority within the home and her control over matters. Seeing a husband teaching a woman to drive a car in a dream may indicate real knowledge that a woman can acquire, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband without teeth in a dreamIn case you see A husband without teeth in a dream, this may indicate some difficulties that the husband may face in his life at that time. Dreaming of marriage without teeth in a dream may indicate the exhaustion and suffering that the husband may suffer in those days, and God knows best. If you see your husband without teeth, it may This indicates some difficulty that he faces in his life to achieve his dreams and ambitions. Dreaming about getting married without teeth in a dream may be a sign that there are many enemies and he must ask God for help. Interpretation of seeing my husband without clothes in a dream: It is possible that seeing one’s husband naked in a dream indicates Indicates some difficulty that the husband is facing in his life at that time. Dreaming of a wedding without clothes in a dream may indicate the financial hardships that you went through during this period or financial obstacles that you may face. In the event that they see the husband without clothes in the dream, it may be a sign of Some disturbances are occurring in their lives during this period and they must seek God’s help. Dreaming of a naked husband in a dream may indicate some family problems occurring between them during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband running after me in a dream If a woman sees that her husband was following her in In a dream, this may indicate his ability to achieve desires and dreams with God’s grace. A dream of a husband chasing his wife in a dream may indicate some major changes occurring in their lives during this time. Whoever saw in her dream that her husband was running after her in the dream, then

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadout website offers you an interpretation of a dream about the dead crying. A dead person crying in a dream is full of visions that have visited the dreams of many people, so the dreamer may feel anxious and panicked from this dream. We have collected for you, my dear, in God, everything about knowing the interpretation of the sleep of the dead, crying for the living, and we have provided you with everything related to the interpretation of the dream in which the dead person is crying. He also collected all the testimonies and interpretations about knowing the symbol of the dead crying in a dream, complete for the elderly, married women, and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars who interpret dreams and visions. If you are interested in the explanation, follow the article. Why dream of a crying death by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a dead person in a dream complete, as the great scholar Ibn Sirin said, shows the intense love that the dreamer has for a dead person, and he often wishes that the dead person would return to life and be by his side. The condition of seeing A dead person in a dream indicates his appearance in his sight. How. The interpretation of seeing the dead screaming at the living can be a vision, depending on the nature of that scream. Why dream of a dead person crying over a living person in a complete dream and the dead person is crying loudly and loudly. Also, the interpretation of dreaming of the deceased crying over the ocean with tears in the dream It may indicate to the dreamer that the deceased regrets some things he did in his life, perhaps because of a sin he committed or because of a break. . His family or leaving his wife. Why dream that a dead person cries and then stops crying in his sleep? In some interpretations of him, it is said that these are among the good visions, with regard to the high status of this deceased before God, and making him distinguished in his home. See also: Why do you dream of kissing a dead person in a complete dream? Imam Al-Sadiq is a warning and warning from the dead to the dreamer to stay away from immorality and disobedience, and to abandon the evil he does. Also, the interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream is a sign for the dreamer of the necessity of prayer and mercy and testifies to the dreamer’s feeling of despair and the actions he takes. To lead his life. See also: Why dream of death and cry over the dead in a complete dream? Why does a dead father cry in a complete dream? A dead father crying in a dream has many signs and systems that may indicate that the dreamer is facing some problems in his life, due to the dreamer’s feeling of poverty. And sadness. Also, the dream interpretation of how to see a dead father crying for a living son in a dream testifies to the evil deeds committed by the dreamer in his earthly life, which angers Almighty God and testifies to the father’s desire to change. Its terms. For the better. See also: Why dream of seeing a corpse in a dream? Crying of the dead in a dream is complete for a person. A single woman who saw her deceased father crying in a complete dream is a sign, a warning, and a warning to the girl about upcoming events that may disturb her in her life. In addition, seeing a dead woman crying in a dream is full of women. Al-Wahidat is one of the visions that came to her to warn her against wrong actions, and this may be a result of this being a fata

title: Interpretation of dreams about cats and mice by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cats and mice: The appearance of cats and mice in a dream is one of the interesting things that makes a person think: Do they indicate good or bad? Sometimes a person finds mice chasing him in a dream or sees cats attacking him, which means that there are multiple situations that appear in sleep related to cats and mice. What are the most important symbols of a dream about cats and mice? We talk about the following. Interpretation of a dream about cats and mice If you see mice in your dream and there are a lot of them, this indicates the ease of collecting money in the coming period and getting a lot of comfort and survival, and you get a very special promotion. Sometimes a person finds a conflict between cats and mice in His dream, and this scene shows the extreme tension he is suffering from, his scattered thoughts and the lack of harmony and comfort in some of his affairs at the present time, while if you see these cats defeating mice and getting rid of them completely, then the dream is a good omen for what is happening in your immediate life and will get you out of distress and dark psychological situations. Interpretation Dreams about cats and mice by Ibn Sirin Dream scholars say that seeing cats and mice in a dream indicates good or bad. Sometimes mice are white like cats. In this case the concept portends the acquisition of mental and physical peace, in order to get rid of cramped circumstances and sadness. As well as the feeling of victory and joy, and if he is sick, he will recover quickly. Sometimes the sleeper finds mice in his dream, and if a man sees a black mouse, this indicates the cunning of the woman around him and her hateful qualities that haunt him, which means that he will fall into unhappy events and crises because of this woman who She is trying to ruin his life and change his circumstances for the worse, so he should not obey her or listen to her because she will make his days feel sorry for her, and if you see rats in your house without them harming you, this is a good sign that they will do so soon. Harvesting many halal livelihoods. Interpretation of dreams of cats and mice for single women. Legalists say that seeing cats and mice for individuals indicates many signs and that it is good to get rid of these mice with cats, as the interpretation indicates comfort, kindness, and salvation from distress and psychological problems, in addition to their closeness to humans. The righteous. Their official relationship with him, and if there are mice in the house, this indicates collecting money and getting a lot of it. Sometimes the dreamer sees cats and mice in her house and a major conflict occurs between them. Some jurists point out that she is confused by some of the circumstances that are happening to her at the present time and she is going through some unpleasant events and pressures that affect her health and spirit, and if she sees a lot of cats and mice, then this is it. Indicating that there are people trying to harm her, especially if they try to get close to her and harm her. Interpretation of a dream about cats and mice for a married woman. If cats and mice appeared to a married woman during her dream and they were in her bedroom, then the interpretation shows that there is someone searching her life and trying to reach her secrets, i.e. That there is a group of people. from

title: Learn the interpretation of lighting a fire in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream of lighting a fire in the house, and the interpretation of a dream of lighting a fire and extinguishing it.

preview.html: Lighting a fire in a dreamAmong the confusing visions that cause stress on the soul, such as lighting a fire in reality, can eliminate the loneliness of darkness, prepare food, or have a plug for warmth and protection, but it can also be due to harm and damage to someone. Therefore, lighting a fire can have both good and bad meanings, depending on the shape of the fire, its extent, the person who lit it, and many other cases with different meanings. Lighting a fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Lighting a fire in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about lighting a fire. It has many meanings, including praise and hate, depending on the purpose. Of lighting a fire, its limits and size, and who lit it and for whom. If the dreamer lights a big fire in the street so that people gather around him, this is a good sign that he will become a celebrity and exert a great influence on everyone to benefit from it and make them happy. But if the dreamer sees someone lighting a simple candle for him To illuminate his path, it means that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will provide him with useful and good company, he is about to meet someone who will do a lot. Positive things will change in his next life (God willing). While whoever sees that he is setting fire to his house, this means that there will be an event or occasion that all the people in his house will witness and that will have a great impact on everyone, and this often happens. Be for the best. Lighting a fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that lighting a fire has multiple interpretations, most of which foretells good events that the dreamer and his family must witness. If the dreamer lights a simple spark to light his house, this means that the crisis or difficult problem he is suffering from in his home will end. Soon. As for the one who lights a very bright fire in the street, he is a kind-hearted person who is loved by everyone around him and seeks to spread justice and good benefits to everyone who needs it. While he who lights the fire and holds it with both hands, he is anxious and hard-working, and loves to drink from the seas of knowledge and culture. He never stops asking to learn new skills and modern sciences. Does the dream confuse you and you cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website. Lighting a fire in a dream for a single woman. This vision has many meanings, including praise, which heralds goodness, and cruelty, which heralds danger or portends a path full of evil. If an unmarried woman sees that a fire is burning in her home to warm her and gather her family around her, then this A sign that her wedding date is approaching with the person she loves in a joyful ceremony in which family members and loved ones gather. To make them all happy. If the dreamer sets fire to her personal items, this may be evidence of her remorse for all the actions she did in the previous period and the bad habits with which she wasted her life on useless things and her desire to leave them and correct them. Her path in the world. But if the visionary lights a small spark in a street full of passers-by, this means that she will achieve great success in one field and surpass everyone else and may soon become a celebrity, and people seek to get close to her.

title: Interpretation of seeing loss in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of loss in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Interpretation of seeing loss in a dream. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of loss in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Losing money in a dream indicates the occurrence of unpleasant things in the life of the fortuneteller. The dreamer sees that he returned his money after losing it in the dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a bird attacking me in a dream. We will look at the most important interpretations that were said about the interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream. It could be a sign of exposure to trouble, and God knows the unseen. When I see A bird attacking me repeatedly in a dream may indicate haters, and God knows best. If a married man sees a bird attacking him, this may indicate a problem, and God knows the unseen. As for the dreamer, if he sees blood, it may indicate the invalidity of his dream, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead people in the form of a bird in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead people in the form of a bird in In a dream, we did not find specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a dead person may indicate the dead person’s need for supplication and charity, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the dead could indicate the dreamer’s failure in his rights, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dead, it indicates goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about birds. Hungry in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about hungry birds in a dream Seeing birds means goodness and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees feeding birds, it may indicate goodness and care, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the dreamer feeding birds, it can lead to contentment, and God knows the unseen. In the case of seeing a married man feeding birds, this may indicate To the stability of married life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a strange bird in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a strange bird in a dream could indicate bad news, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, if the dreamer sees a strange-looking bird flying in the sky and disappearing, this may indicate changes, and God knows the unseen. When you see a bird A stranger falls in front of him, perhaps it is evidence of numbers and blessings, and God knows the unseen. If one girl sees an ugly bird, this may lead to bad behavior, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a big bird in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a big bird in a dream could be a sign of freedom from worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a fire bird in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fire bird in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see that. However, seeing birds can express goodness, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees birds, this can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees birds, this It indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds hunting in a dream. Interpretation of dreams. Seeing birds hunting in a dream can be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. In the case of watching a young man hunting birds, it may express his mind. It may also indicate the wisdom that he enjoys. God is also higher and more knowledgeable. When The dreamer sees a bird hunting, it can lead to goodness and livelihood,

title: Interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Through the encyclopedia, we talk about the interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream. Drowning is death by suffocation from water or other liquids. A person can drown as a result of not knowing how to swim, as he cannot float on the surface of the water. Drowning is the result of increased fear, which leads to the body becoming rigid. Once a person is covered with water for two minutes, he enters a coma and from there until death, while some studies have shown that 7% Of the deaths in the world due to drowning. This is what we know about drowning in life, but in the science of dream interpretation, the meaning of drowning is completely different. The dream is a false awakening and he has fantasies during his sleep, which may be difficult to achieve. In life.Interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream. Scientists differed in the interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream. Some see it as a sign of kindness and others say it is a sign of obstacles and problems that the dreamer faces. The following are the most prominent of these interpretations: Seeing the dreamer drowning interprets that worldly desires have distracted him from the religion of Almighty God and we are attracted to sin. Seeing a girl drowning in water means that someone will enter her life and begin a love relationship between them, which will soon end and fail. Also, seeing a sick person drowning It indicates that his health problems will double as a result of this disease, but he will recover soon. As for the visions of drowning for students of science, they explain that the dreamer will enjoy many good things in this world and become one of the men close to the ruler. While the dreamer sees that he is diving and floating in the water, he is trying to stay afloat. Alive, he will obtain a great fortune of money. While dreams of drowning in clear water portend harm from an enemy to the dreamer, he must be careful not to harm him. In addition to visions of drowning in the winter, where his dream is trembling, it indicates the possibility of misfortune from men in Authority, but he will survive soon.Interpretation of a dream about a relative drowningMany people dream of relatives in their dreams, these visions can bring kindness to their owner or bring them difficulties and problems. We consider the following interpretations of a dream about relatives drowning: The dreamer’s visions of saving one of his relatives while she is unmarried indicate the date of her upcoming wedding, and the dreamer will help her make this marriage a success. As for the visions of a married woman saving one of her relatives, it leads to the strength of bonding and affection between them. If she fails to save If you dream of your relative, the visions show that many problems and crises may arise as a result of neglecting to assume the responsibilities of children. Dreams of a pregnant woman drowning in a relative indicate problems for the fetus during pregnancy. Also, seeing a pregnant woman saving her relatives in a dream means that many will be overcome. From problems in his life with the help of the dreamer. Visions of a divorced woman lead one of her relatives to drown in one of the most difficult stages of his life, but he quickly overcomes it and survives. Seeing a relative drowning in a dream means that he will fall into problems that he cannot solve without the dreamer’s help, as he offers him Help alleviate these fears. Seeing an unknown person drowning in a dream is a vision of the dreamer

title: Interpretation of dreams about praying and holding a wedding ceremony in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing that he prays and recites the Qur’an in the shrine of Mecca in a dream. Seeing him performing prayers in the Kaaba or the Sanctuary is beautiful news of God’s forgiveness and satisfaction and shows the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his passion. To worship and wait for the day when he is able to perform prayers in the sanctuary and see the Qur’an attached to it, may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a life partner with whom the heart is satisfied and with whom he is happy. And to have good character. Interpretation of a dream about seeing prayer in the Sanctuary in a dream: When you see the dreamer in a dream performing prayer on the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a high position and great honor in this world. Also, when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will be close to the ruler or a person with influence or supervision in his city.• When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing prayer in the Kaaba, this may indicate The dreamer is a good person who adheres to his religion and people bear witness to his piety. Also, when you see the dreamer in a dream that he is praying in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will go for Hajj and obtain the satisfaction of God Almighty. • When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is turning towards the Qiblah to pray in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will He has great honor and great status among the people. Also, when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is turning towards the Qiblah to pray in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will gain safety after a period of stress and fear. Interpretation of a dream about seeing his marriage contract in the Haram in a dream When the dreamer sees in a dream his mother concluding a marriage contract If he gets married in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer will marry a righteous woman whose father may be one of the sheikhs or righteous people. Also, when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is holding his wedding ceremony in the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer has approached his term in the event that he does not see the wedding ceremony in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in the wrong place in a dream• When the dreamer sees in The dream is that he sees the Kaaba in the wrong place and there are no people around it. This may indicate that the dreamer will receive confirmation about something that was worrying and bothering him. . Also, when the dreamer sees in a dream that the Holy Kaaba is not in its place and that he ignores prayer, this can be a warning to the dreamer to return to God Almighty and perform the duties that he left behind. • When the dreamer sees in a dream that the Kaaba was not in its place and that this person was Waiting for marriage, it may mean that the dreamer will get married soon. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream, he sees the Kaaba in the wrong place and has not performed the Hajj obligation. This may indicate that the dreamer must perform the Hajj obligation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing that he is above the Kaaba in a dream When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is performing his prayers on the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer has some kind of flaw or deficiency in his religion. Also, when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying above the Kaaba, this may indicate that the dreamer

title: Interpretation of corn in a dream: seeing eating corn in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of corn, whether yellow or white, is eaten roasted or boiled, for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and others. Corn in a dream is one of the most beautiful dreams. Corn is a beautiful crop that tastes good and has many benefits that the body needs, but seeing it In a dream, it has many meanings, and this we will learn through our topic, to interpret seeing corn in a dream. Interpretation of corn in a dream Corn in a dream indicates a lot of money, little benefits, and an inactive male. When one sees ears of corn in a dream, this is an indication of many... Good things that the dreamer will receive and indicates the fulfillment of many desires, goals and ambitions that he wants to achieve in his work. He sees in a dream many ears of green corn in the field. The dreamer’s song may appear in the vision, but he spends a lot of his money, while the vision of harvesting corn shows the dreamer’s success in his work and his obtaining the highest positions. Interpretation of boiled corn in a dream: The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees corn in a dream, then the vision may indicate very good, abundant livelihood and a lot of money, while seeing eating boiled corn indicates lawful livelihood and money without effort or fatigue, and when a person sees in His dream is that he is emptying ears of wheat for him. The vision shows that the dreamer loves doing good and spending for the needy and the poor. Interpretation of yellow corn in a dream: A pregnant woman who sees corn in a dream, the vision may indicate that she will get a lot of money, but this money will disappear from her soon, but if She sees that she is eating yellow corn and buying it, this may indicate that. The time of childbirth is approaching, and she will be healthy and safe, as will her child. Interpretation of roasted corn in a dream: A pregnant woman who dreams that she is eating roasted corn, the vision may indicate an easy and effortless birth without fatigue, but if she sees that her house is full of ears of corn while eating roasted corn, this is good news of her arrival. A lot of good and abundant livelihood and a lot of money, but he will spend that money and not any of it. Interpretation of white corn in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he is harvesting corn, then the vision indicates many goods, livelihood, money, and the accomplishment of many achievements and he will obtain them. . But if a married woman sees white corn in a dream, this may indicate concealment, stability, and life in a new life full of happiness and love with her husband. Interpretation of corn in a dream by Ibn Sirin Corn in a dream symbolizes good and abundant livelihood for the dreamer. As for seeing corn on farms, it symbolizes happiness Joy and success, God willing. Also, seeing green corn symbolizes the dreamer’s success in the affairs of his life. As for cooked corn, it symbolizes the comfort of life and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s dreams on the ground. Wasting corn kernels in a dream symbolizes good morals and good qualities. It also symbolizes harvesting corn. To the happy events and good luck to you
